mapper.select: SELECT U_NO, U_ID, U_PW, U_NAME, U_POSTCODE, U_ADDRESS, U_DETAILADDRESS, U_EXTRAADDRESS, U_NICKNAME, U_PHONE, U_PROFILEIMG, U_EMAIL, U_LOGINCOUNT, TO_CHAR(U_LOGINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') U_LOGINDATE, U_GRADE FROM PUSER WHERE U_ID = #{ u_id }
SELECT COUNT(U_ID) FROM PUSER WHERE U_ID = #{u_id}
SELECT COUNT(U_PHONE) FROM PUSER WHERE U_PHONE = #{u_phone}
SELECT COUNT(U_NICKNAME) FROM PUSER WHERE U_NICKNAME = #{u_nickname}
SELECT COUNT(U_EMAIL) FROM PUSER WHERE U_EMAIL = #{u_email}
mapper.update: UPDATE PUSER SET U_LOGINDATE = SYSDATE, U_LOGINCOUNT = (U_LOGINCOUNT + 1) WHERE TRUNC(U_LOGINDATE) != TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND U_NO = #{u_no}

UPDATE PUSER SET U_GRADE = CASE WHEN U_LOGINCOUNT > 30 THEN 'D' WHEN U_LOGINCOUNT > 15 THEN 'C' WHEN U_LOGINCOUNT > 5 THEN 'B' ELSE 'A' END WHERE TRUNC(U_LOGINDATE) != TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND U_NO = #{u_no}
